```{r}
load("../Qload/data.RData")
#check for outliers visually
boxplot(train[,-1])

colnames(train)[43]

boxplot(train[,c("FRBLMCI","MEDCPIM158SFRBCLE")])

train[train$FRBLMCI %in% boxplot.stats(train[,29])$out & (train$FRBLMCI>8 | train$FRBLMCI<(-8)) ,c("date","FRBLMCI")]
```
